channel.title: Electric Aircraft on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Electric Aircraft on FinanClub

item.title: BA
item.description: score:823 Chances: The aerospace industry is recovering, and Chinese airlines’ need to renew their fleets could present an opportunity for Boeing. The launch of electric vertical takeoff and landing aircraft by companies like Joby and Archer could offer potential upside for Boeing. Positive performance of blue chip stocks, including Boeing, contributed to higher market benchmarks.

item.title: JOBY
item.description: score:1050 Chances: Joby Aviation (NYSE: JOBY) issued its Q2 2023 Shareholder Letter with operational and financial results. The company is developing all-electric aircraft for commercial passenger service. Joby Aviation submitted Certification Plans to the FAA, progressing toward certifying its aircraft for commercial use.
